main.name: Xyra
main.occupation: Full Stack Web Developer & Counseling Center Assistant
main.bio: My name is Xyra Arroyo, I'm a Full Stack Web Developer. Currently working at ELCCC as a counselors assistant meanwhile I am always learning something new & in pursuit of applying my tech skills in the workplace.
main.contactmessage: I would love to get to know you and see how I could use my skills to help or work with you!

resume.skillmessage: Here are a few of my tech skills and the level of knowledge I have of them (for now) :)

education.description: With my passion for caring about the mental health of all people, I will then proceed to receive my Masters in Psychology. Then after, my doctorates.
Graduated with Ambition & Drive to learn more & keep going deeper into what I learned so far with coding. Definitely not done yet.

work.title: Counselors & Psychologist Assistant
work.description: Aide the Counselors, Psychologist, Supervisor, & Executive Director with handling new and old client confidential information and files.

projects.title: Space Voyager
projects.category: Become a space voyager with this fun and interactive application!

projects.title: Eat-Da-Burger
projects.category: This app lets you choose burgers from a list to be eaten and shows which burgers have already been eaten!(functionality work in progress)

projects.title: Employee Template
projects.category: This application will generate a software engineering team command line template.

projects.title: Weather Application
projects.category: This weather application includes a search box that allows the user to input a city name in order for them to view the current weather status on that city chosen. (styling work in progress)

projects.title: Calendar App
projects.category: A simple calendar application where the user is able to apply texts for tasks in each time slot according to what time it is , in real time.(styling work in progress)

projects.title: Travel Hub
projects.category: This useful application gives you the ability to plan your trip and stay within your budget.

projects.title: User Directory
projects.category: Allows large business to locate employees through an easy search that provides some demographic information.

projects.title: README Generator
projects.category: This README Generator allows developers to create a simple but thorough, quick and easy to use README for their app.

testimonials.text: Being happy isn't getting what you want, it's wanting what you have.
It's not about deserve; It's about what you believe. And I believe in Love.
